item.title: Linked post
item.description: I’m a linked post in the menu. You can add other posts by adding the following line to the frontmatter: menu = "main"

item.title: Categories Post
item.description: I’m a post with multiple categories in the frontmatter: categories = ["company","publishing","web"] Kicking off the blog.
